text: The Great Muppet Caper is a British-American musical comedy movie released in 1981. It is the second movie in the muppets franchise and the first to be directed by Jim Henson. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 comedy movies Category:1981 mystery movies Category:1980s musical movies Category:1980s family movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American musical movies Category:American family movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British mystery movies Category:British musical movies Category:British family movies Category:Movies set in hotels Category:Movies set in London Category:Heist movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Henson
title: The Great Muppet Caper
